localizedMeta.description:
THIS CONTENT IS NOT COMPATIBLE WITH Androidâ„¢ DEVICES.

Gravity Cube is a high score game about manipulating gravity to avoid obstacles. Race through an infinite tunnel and swipe to change the direction of gravity. Dodge the fiery walls for as long as you can to earn a high score.

Package size: 36 MB - More storage space required for install

Compatibility information:
Number of players for local play: 1 Player

Supported interfaces/sensors
- Touchscreen
- Controller / On-screen controller

Supported languages:
English(United States)/English(United Kingdom)

2014 Sargun Vohra

Android is a trademark of Google Inc.
